SCTX:
Begin fightGnawTooth
 
short counter
Short NoLore
short doonceA
short doonceB
 
if ( counter < 20 )
    Set counter to counter + 1
    Return
    ;for speed...
endif
 
Set counter to 0
 
if ( doonceA == 0 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "Endroni Dalas" == 0 )
	    if ( GetDistance "Endroni Dalas" < 400 )
	        StartCombat "Endroni Dalas"
     	   set doonceA to 1
	    endif
	endif
endif
 
if ( doonceB == 0 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "Uresa Omoril" == 0 )
	    if ( GetDistance "Uresa Omoril" < 400 )
	        StartCombat "Uresa Omoril"
	        set doonceB to 1
	    endif
	endif
endif

end fightGnawTooth
